description: G.1 Leyland Cypress x2 - Reduce height by 2m and trim to shape clearing all elevations. T.2 Norway Maple - 2m Reduction in height, 3m reduction in spread & deadwood leaving natural aesthetic form and ensuring 3m clearance from adjacent buildings.T.3 Holm Oak - Remove lowest lateral limb over drive to balance crown & deadwood. T.4 Corsican Pine - Deadwood & carry out aerial inspection.T.5 Norway Maple - 2m Reduction in height, 3m reduction in spread & deadwood leaving natural aesthetic form, crown lift to 3m from ground level & deadwood. T.6 Eucalyptus - Reduce regrowth back to previous reduction points.T.7 Bhutan Pine - Deadwood & carry out aerial inspection.
